reviewText: This was very inspiring. And the fact that the founder created this style to rejuvenate Japan's young people is commendable.

Found it to be well done and very informative. Not much info on Shorinji Kempo available in english. This is an update to my review. This change reflects the disc itself, not the content. When I tried to watch at a friends house DVD skipped and froze. Basically i paid 25 bucks for a single viewing. These are DVD-R's...Not DVD's This is NOT stated in the product description. Although in the case and secure, the disc arrived scuffed and scratched. Great content, poor manufacturing.
